name: Level AI
description: Level AI is a platform for businesses to automate tedious workflows and transform customer experience.
long_description: Level AI is redefining how the modern customer contact center works. Leveraging conversational intelligence to provide real-time insights, empowers agents to provide the kind of help customers want at the moment they need it with the utmost efficiency. Level AI is backed by leading investors including Battery Ventures, ENIAC, and Village Global.
